title: Metagenomic sequencing with spiked primer enrichment for viral diagnostics and genomic surveillance
body:
Donor plasma matrix was spiked with viral culture, and viral titer was determined by quantitative RT-PCR c EBOV-SP/ZIKV-SP/DENV-SP, target virus-specific spiked primers at 4 µM concentration and mixed with RH at 10:1 ratio; ArboV-SP, arbovirus panel spiked primers at 10 µM concentration mixed with RH at 10:1 ratio; HFV-SP, hemorrhagic fever virus panel spiked primers at 20 µM concentration mixed with RH at 10:1 ratio d median fold change was 13 e median fold change was 16 f equivalent to 2 viral copies per cDNA reaction; 10 cp/mL was achieved from 100-fold dilution of 1000 cp/mL sample.

Abbreviations: RPM, reads per million; ONT, Oxford Nanopore Technologies; RH, random hexamer; SP, spiked primers 1 1,000 2,000 3,000 4,000 5,000 6,000 7,000 8,000 9,000 10,837 1 1,000 2,000 3,000 4,000 5,000 6,000 7,000 8,000 9,000 10,000 11,066
